cells.data:
---
# Used to restore database to postgres for all databases
- hosts: stretch
  # connection: local
  vars_files:
    - "../../secrets.yml"
    - "../../properties.yml"
  gather_facts: False
  vars:
    - docker_port: "2375"
    - db_name: catalogs
    # current_date_time is a fact that is set below
    - tmp_backup_file: '/tmp/{{ vars["db_name"] }}_dump_{{ vars["current_date_time"] }}.sql'
    - backup_dest: '/tmp/catalogs/'
  tasks:
    # generate the current date time for creating unique backup file names.
    - set_fact: current_date_time="{{lookup('pipe','date +%m-%d-%Y_%H_%M_%S')}}"
    
    - name: "Backup {{ db_name }} Database"
      shell: >
        docker exec -t {{ postgres_db_host }} 
        pg_dump -U {{ postgres_db_user }} -d {{ db_name }} > {{ tmp_backup_file }}

    - pause:
        seconds: 30
    # Download the backed up file from the remote to local directory
    - fetch: 
        src: " {{ tmp_backup_file }}"
        dest: "{{ backup_dest }}"
        mode: 0774
        flat: yes
      register: stdout

    - name: debug output
      debug: msg={{ stdout }}


    # Delete the backed up file on the remote directory
    # - name: "Clean up the tmp file"
    #   file:
    #     path: "{{ tmp_backup_file }}"
    #     state: absent
